original_text: These are the sons of Ehud (they were heads of fathers' houses of the inhabitants of Geba, and they were carried into exile to Manahath):
korean_text: 에훗의 아들들은 이러하니라 그들은 게바 주민의 우두머리로서, 사로잡혀 마나핫으로 갔으니

sentences.original_text: These are the sons of Ehud
they were heads of fathers' houses of the inhabitants of Geba
and they were carried into exile to Manahath
